languages.text: "Отклонение от облика истинного человека уродует не только тело, но и душу. Неудивительно, что среди еретиков верховодил тот, в ком зло проявило себя особенно явно".
"Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."
languages.original_text: "Отклонение от облика истинного человека уродует не только тело, но и душу. Неудивительно, что среди еретиков верховодил тот, в ком зло проявило себя особенно явно".

traits.locale_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed one of them all."
"Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed one of them all."
"Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."
"Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."
"Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."
"Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."

languages.text: «La desviación de la forma pura humana mutila el alma tanto como el cuerpo. No debería sorprendernos que el líder de los herejes fuera el más deformado de todos ellos».
languages.original_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."

traits.locale_text: «La desviación de la forma pura humana mutila el alma tanto como el cuerpo. No debería sorprendernos que el líder de los herejes fuera el más deformado de todos ellos».

languages.text: 「人間の真の姿からの逸脱は、肉体と同様に魂を切り刻みます。異端者のリーダーが最も奇形であったとしても、驚きはしません」
languages.original_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."

traits.locale_text: 「人間の真の姿からの逸脱は、肉体と同様に魂を切り刻みます。異端者のリーダーが最も奇形であったとしても、驚きはしません」

languages.text: “偏离真正的人类形态不仅仅会伤害身体，还会扭曲灵魂。这群异端分子的领袖是他们之中畸形程度最严重的那个，这一点不该让我们感到惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."

traits.locale_text: “偏离真正的人类形态不仅仅会伤害身体，还会扭曲灵魂。这群异端分子的领袖是他们之中畸形程度最严重的那个，这一点不该让我们感到惊讶。”

languages.text: "Abweichungen von der wahren menschlichen Form verstümmeln die Seele ebenso wie den Körper. Es sollte uns nicht überraschen, dass der Anführer der Ketzer der Missgestaltetste von allen war."
languages.original_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."

traits.locale_text: "Abweichungen von der wahren menschlichen Form verstümmeln die Seele ebenso wie den Körper. Es sollte uns nicht überraschen, dass der Anführer der Ketzer der Missgestaltetste von allen war."

languages.text: « Toute déviance de la véritable forme humaine mutile l'âme autant que le corps. Il n'est guère étonnant que le chef des hérétiques soit le plus contrefait de tous. »
languages.original_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."

traits.locale_text: « Toute déviance de la véritable forme humaine mutile l'âme autant que le corps. Il n'est guère étonnant que le chef des hérétiques soit le plus contrefait de tous. »

languages.text: "Hakiki insan suretinden sapmak, bedeni olduğu kadar ruhu da zedeler. Aralarındaki en kusurlu olanın kâfir lideri oluşu bizi şaşırtmamalı."
languages.original_text: "Deviation from true human form mutilates the soul as much as the body. It should not surprise us that the heretic leader was the most malformed of them all."
